replies.author: _CAI_
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 _CAI_ 于 2012-4-10 18:07 编辑 
qqlanguangwen 发表于 2012-4-10 17:54 
分已经给了 另求怎么装MOD
官网上有看安装方法
客户端：
Setup
For playing install the following mods in the SAME order in to your minecraft.jar:
Risugami's ModLoader
Forge's ModloaderMP (For IC2 1.81 and downward: Flan's ModLoaderMP
SpaceToad's MCForge
It's strongly recommended to install these prequesite mods in the listed order onto a freshly downloaded minecraft.jar for optimum results.也就是说在装工业2前要在你的minecraft.jar里装上Risugami's的ModLoader、Forge's的ModloaderMP但是1.81的工业2也就是1.2.3的工业2是装Flan's的ModLoaderMP和SpaceToad's的MCForge（我不知道1.2.4是否如此）
minecraft.jar就是你的Minecraft游戏目录的bin文件夹里的文件，用压缩文件打开把上面的东西全部拖到里面去。
